long_description: Stay dry and warm on your next kayaking trip in the waterproof, breathable NRS Endurance paddling pants. Waterproof, breathable fabric shields you from splashes while letting sweat vapor escape to keep you dry and comfortable. Neoprene waistband with adjustable rip-and-stick tabs personalizes fit and prevents water entry. Adjustable, rip-and-stick ankle cuffs help keep water out. Articulated knees and a generous cut keep you comfortable while getting in and out of the cockpit. Reinforced knees and Cordura(R) nylon seat improve durability.
short_description: Stay dry and warm on your next kayaking trip in the waterproof, breathable NRS Endurance paddling pants.
